channel.title: [PI] 317 Torva NPC using Player Armour Models :3 help?
channel.description:
im trying to make a Torva NPC for my server. but anytime i add it in. it has a null (thinking cuz i commented out the arm slot?:3) or it just is invisible (when i set arm model to -1(unused???)) but any time i go to spawn it in. one of those things happen...anyway here are my ints for it..will post a pic if needed. :3
[code=java] if(i == 560) { stream.currentOffset = streamIndices[630]; entityDef.aByte68 = 1; // Distance it stands from u entityDef.actions = new String[5]; // Actions for the npc entityDef.actions[1] = "Attack"; //First option //entityDef.actions[2] = ""; //Second option (Optional) //entityDef.actions[3] = ""; //3rd Option (Optional) entityDef.models = new int[10]; //Number of models it uses entityDef.models[0] = 62746; /*Npc's Plate*/ entityDef.models[1] = 62743; /*Npc's Legs*/ entityDef.models[2] = 55728; /*Npc's Gloves*/ entityDef.models[3] = -1; /*Npc's Arms*/(problem could be here?) entityDef.models[4] = 55673; /*Npc's Boots*/ entityDef.models[5] = 56227; /*Npc's Weapon*/ entityDef.models[6] = 62738; /*Npcs's Helmet*/ entityDef.models[7] = 40942; /*Npcs's Shield*/ entityDef.models[8] = 55825; /*Npcs's Amulet*/ entityDef.models[9] = 55902; /*Npcs's Cape*/ entityDef.standAnim = 999;// Npc's Stand Emote entityDef.walkAnim = 999; //walk anim entityDef.combatLevel = 300; //combat level entityDef.name = "Torva"; //name } [/code]

item.title: [PI] 317 Torva NPC using Player Armour Models :3 help?
item.dc:creator: @l0lc0pt3r l0lc0pt3r
item.description:
@l0lc0pt3r wrote:

im trying to make a Torva NPC for my server. but anytime i add it in. it has a null (thinking cuz i commented out the arm slot?:3) or it just is invisible (when i set arm model to -1(unused???)) but any time i go to spawn it in. one of those things happen…anyway here are my ints for it…will post a pic if needed. :3

if(i == 560) {
	stream.currentOffset = streamIndices[630]; 
	entityDef.aByte68 = 1; // Distance it stands from u
	entityDef.actions = new String[5]; // Actions for the npc
	entityDef.actions[1] = "Attack"; //First option
	//entityDef.actions[2] = ""; //Second option (Optional)
	//entityDef.actions[3] = ""; //3rd Option (Optional)
	entityDef.models = new int[10]; //Number of models it uses
	entityDef.models[0] = 62746; /*Npc's Plate*/
	entityDef.models[1] = 62743;  /*Npc's Legs*/
	entityDef.models[2] = 55728; /*Npc's Gloves*/
	entityDef.models[3] = -1; /*Npc's Arms*/(problem could be here?)
	entityDef.models[4] = 55673; /*Npc's Boots*/
	entityDef.models[5] = 56227; /*Npc's Weapon*/
	entityDef.models[6] = 62738; /*Npcs's Helmet*/
	entityDef.models[7] = 40942; /*Npcs's Shield*/
	entityDef.models[8] = 55825; /*Npcs's Amulet*/
	entityDef.models[9] = 55902; /*Npcs's Cape*/
	entityDef.standAnim = 999;// Npc's Stand Emote
	entityDef.walkAnim = 999; //walk anim
	entityDef.combatLevel = 300; //combat level
	entityDef.name = "Torva"; //name
}

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] 317 Torva NPC using Player Armour Models :3 help?
